mapper.select: select inventory.warehouseid as warehouseId, count(itemid) as kindNumOfItem, sum(num) as totalSize, avg(maxsize) as maxSize from inventory,warehouse where inventory.warehouseid = warehouse.warehouseid and warehouse.mainsiteid = #{mainsiteid} group by inventory.warehouseid
select cid as categoryId,name,descn from warehouse,category where warehouseid = #{warehouseId} and warehouse.categoryid=category.cid
select itemid as itemId, warehouseid as warehouseId, num as itemNum, logicinventory as logicInventory from inventory where itemid=#{itemId} and warehouseid=#{warehouseId}

select warehouse.warehouseid as warehouseId from warehouse,item where item.cid = warehouse.categoryid and item.itemid = #{itemId} and mainsiteid = #{mainsiteId} and exists (select inventory.warehouseid from inventory where inventory.warehouseid = warehouse.warehouseid group by inventory.warehouseid having max(maxsize) - sum(num) >= #{itemNum})

select warehouse.mainsiteid as mainsiteId, sum(inventory.num) as itemInventory from warehouse,item,inventory where item.itemid = inventory.itemid and item.cid = warehouse.categoryid and warehouse.warehouseid = inventory.warehouseid and item.itemid = #{itemId} group by warehouse.mainsiteid

select itemid as itemId, warehouseid as warehouseId, num as itemNum, logicinventory as logicInventory from warehouse,item where item.itemid = #{itemId} and item.cid = warehouse.categoryid and mainsiteid = #{warehouseId}
